attributes.action: APHA must act on the failures with TRACE's & Pet Passports. Justice for Barnaby
attributes.additional_details: Knowing my dog would be quarantined, I chose to inform the authorities to protect the people, pets & wildlife in the UK. APHA have not acted on evidence provided. Provided with details of a van of illegal dogs arriving-they failed to stop it. Proof of corrupt vets and TRACE units in Romania-still operating. Traffickers operating on FB-still sending dogs. Romanian rescue dogs are still entering with no rabies vaccine. Rabies & Echinococcus will enter the UK unless Michael Gove & APHA take action!
attributes.background: My 'rescue dog' Barnaby was bought in the UK. Apparently, from Romania. He had tapeworm so I investigated. I discovered he was from Serbia & know now he wasn't wormed or rabies vaccinated or titered as required. I spoke out believing APHA would take action against those involved, they haven't!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about TRACES and pet passports, but we're not sure what action you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
